title: IModelDocExtension.GetVisibleBox
description: Gets the visible bounding box set by IModelDocExtension::SetVisibleBox for a part or an assembly.
signature:
System.Boolean GetVisibleBox( 
   out MathPoint
UpperLeft
,
   out MathPoint
LowerRight
)

parameters.name: UpperLeft
parameters.description: Upper-left point of the bounding box

parameters.name: LowerRight
parameters.description: Lower-right point of the bounding box

returns: True if the bounding box was set, false if not
